QuestData.Title: A Way Back In
QuestData.Description: I must get back into Suramar.$b$bI was exiled unfairly! I cannot live out here like this. I need the Nightwell's energies...$b$bI saw a message carved into a wall a few days ago. There is someone in the Water Gardens who can smuggle people into the city.$b$bIt said "We shall drink of the Well again."$b$bI cannot survive a confrontation with the guards again. Will you go in my stead? Once I am back in the city I can repay you.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope for both of our sakes that you were not followed. We must work quickly, considering how close I am.
